alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CROOK COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Sundance, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren Peak around 155 PM MDT. Cook Lake around 205 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 173 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
